Name: DiFuMo
Description: Dictionaries of Functional Modes (DiFuMo) - multi-resolution probabilistic atlases for extracting functional signals from fMRI data with different dimensionalities (64, 128, 256, 512, and 1024 networks). These modes are optimized to represent BOLD timeseries over a wide range of experimental conditions.
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite: Dadi, K., Varoquaux, G., Machlouzarides-Shalit, A., Gorgolewski, K.J., Wassermann, D., Thirion, B., & Mensch, A. (2020). Fine-grain atlases of functional modes for fMRI analysis. NeuroImage, 221, 117126.
Funding: European Research Council (ERC Grant Noria), ANR NeuroRef, ERC-StG NeuroLang, Canada First Research Excellence Fund (McGill University)
DerivedFrom: 27 fMRI studies from OpenNeuro (2.4TB total, millions of functional brain volumes)
